file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 32-20-06-04 - NOSE-LANDING-GEAR DOOR PROTECTIVE RUBBER SHAPES - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL NOSE-LANDING-GEAR DOOR PROTECTIVE RUBBER SHAPES - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove and install the NLG-door protective rubber shapes. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY NLG-DOOR PROTECTIVE RUBBER ALL 32-20-06-000-801-A SHAPES - REMOVAL NLG-DOOR PROTECTIVE RUBBER ALL 32-20-06-400-801-A SHAPES - INSTALLATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 32-20-06 Page 1 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 32-20-06-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. NLG-DOOR PROTECTIVE RUBBER SHAPES - REMOVAL A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to remove the NLG-door protective rubber shapes. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION HYDRAULIC SYSTEM - PRESSURIZATION WITH AMM TASK 29-10-00-860-802-A/200 EMDP AMM TASK 32-00-01-910-801-A/200 LG SAFETY PIN - INSTALLATION AND REMOVAL SAFETY PIN OF THE NLG DOORS SOLENOID AMM TASK 32-00-02-910-801-A/200 VALVE - INSTALLATION AND REMOVAL S.B.145-32-0036 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 713 713LH NLG-compartment LH forward door 714 714RH NLG-compartment RH forward door D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Nose-landing-gear door I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) On aircraft PRE-MOD. S.B.145-32-0036, make sure that the pressure in hydraulic system No. 1 is fully released ( AMM TASK 29-10-00-860-802-A/200). (2) On aircraft POST-MOD. S.B.145-32-0036, install the safety pin of the NLG-door solenoid valve (AMM TASK 32-00-02-910-801-A/200). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 32-20-06 Page 2 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (3) Make sure that the safety pins of the landing gears are installed ( AMM TASK 32-00-01-910-801-A/200). J. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Remove the screws (1) (3 positions) and, if applicable, the nut (5). (2) Remove the washers (2) (3 positions). (3) Remove the plate (3) and the protective rubber shape (4). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 32-20-06 Page 3 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ALL NLG-Door Protective Rubber Shapes - Removal/Installation Figure 401 A ZONES 713 714 B DET. A 4. PROTECTIVE RUBBER SHAPE (1) 3. PLATE (1) 2. WASHER (3) 1. SCREW (3) 4. PROTECTIVE RUBBER SHAPE (1) 3. PLATE (1) 5. NUT (3) 1. SCREW (3) 2. WASHER (3) 4. PROTECTIVE RUBBER 1. SCREW (3) 3. PLATE (1) SHAPE (1) 1. SCREW (3) 4. PROTECTIVE RUBBER SHAPE (1) DET. B 2. WASHER (3) 2. WASHER (3) 3. PLATE (1) 5. NUT (3) FOR AIRCRAFT S/N DET. B 1 004/005/006 AND 007, ONLY. EM145AMM320373A.DGN EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 32-20-06 Page 4 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 32-20-06-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. NLG-DOOR PROTECTIVE RUBBER SHAPES - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to install the NLG-door protective rubber shapes. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 32-00-01-910-801-A/200 LG SAFETY PIN - INSTALLATION AND REMOVAL SAFETY PIN OF THE NLG DOORS SOLENOID AMM TASK 32-00-02-910-801-A/200 VALVE - INSTALLATION AND REMOVAL S.B.145-32-0036 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 713 713LH NLG-compartment LH forward door 714 714RH NLG-compartment RH forward door D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Nose-landing-gear door I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Before the installation, use the plate (3) to mark the positions of the holes in the new rubber shape (4), then drill them, as applicable. (2) Install the rubber shape (4) and the plate (3) with the screws (1) (03 positions) and, if applicable, the nut (5). Refer to (Figure 401). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 32-20-06 Page 5 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) On aircraft POST-MOD. S.B.145-32-0036, remove the safety pin from the NLG-door solenoid valve (AMM TASK 32-00-02-910-801-A/200). (2) Remove the safety pins from the landing gears ( AMM TASK 32-00-01-910-801-A/ 200). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 32-20-06 Page 6 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
